name: notcool
text: This is going to sound awful, but I would pay good, good money to see your avicon singing, with complete lack of emotion and thousand-yard stare, Norman Greenbaum's Spirit in the Sky. It would terrify me and I would never have to worry about sleeping ever again.

text: I'd be so fucking pissed if someone threw my phone at me
